pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with President of Argentina, Mauricio Macri | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
The Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, met today with the President of Argentina, Mauricio Macri, on the margins of the Global Citizen Concert in Hamburg, Germany.

The leaders reaffirmed the strong bilateral relations that exist between their countries and held exchanges on ways to increase trade and investment, and enhance cooperation within regional and multilateral organizations such as the Organization of American States (OAS). The leaders committed to working closely together on their respective G7 and G20 presidencies in 2018.

The leaders also discussed the deteriorating situation in Venezuela and reiterated their call on the Venezuelan Government to restore the constitutional order, the need for dialogue and respect for the democratic rights of Venezuelan citizens, as enshrined in the charter of the OAS and the Inter-American Democratic Charter.  Prime Minister Trudeau and President Macri committed to continue working with hemispheric partners to find a solution to the crisis.
